content:
Check:
  all:
    - name: dataset_name
      operator: starts_with
      value: FA
    - name: dataset_name
      operator: longer than
      value: 2
    - name: Characters in dataset name after "FA"
      operator: is_contained_by
      value:
        - List of domains
Core:
  Id: CDISC.SDTMIG.CG0333
  Version: '1'
  Status: Draft
Description: Trigger error when parent domain referenced in Findings About dataset
  name is not present in the study
Outcome:
  Message: Parent domain referenced in Findings About dataset name is not present
    in the study
Rule Type: Record Data
Sensitivity: Dataset
Authorities:
  - Organization: CDISC
    Standards:
      - Name: SDTMIG
        Version: '3.4'
        References:
          - Origin: SDTM and SDTMIG Conformance Rules
            Rule Identifier:
              Id: CG0333
              Version: '1'
            Version: '2.0'
            Citations:
              - Cited Guidance: 'If splitting Findings About by parent domain, then
                  the dataset name would be the domain code, "FA", plus the two-character
                  domain code for parent domain code (e.g., "FACM"). '
                Document: IG v3.4
                Item: '6'
                Section: 4.1.7
Scope:
  Classes:
    Include:
      - ALL
  Domains:
    Include:
      - ALL

json.Description: Trigger error when parent domain referenced in Findings About dataset name is not present in the study

Outcome.Message: Parent domain referenced in Findings About dataset name is not present in the study

Citations.Cited_Guidance: If splitting Findings About by parent domain, then the dataset name would be the domain code, "FA", plus the two-character domain code for parent domain code (e.g., "FACM").
